alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Donley; Gray; Hutchinson; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 7:40PM CDT until May 10 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Armstrong County in the Panhandle of Texas... Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Gray County in the Panhandle of Texas... Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... Donley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 740 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pringle to 7 miles east of Borger to 3 miles southeast of White Deer to 7 miles east of Goodnight, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Pampa, Borger, Panhandle, Clarendon, Claude, Miami, Fritch, Stinnett, White Deer, Mclean, Groom, Lefors, Skellytown, Howardwick, Hedley, Sanford, Lelia Lake, Lake Mcclellan, Goodnight and Pringle. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Carson; Donley; Gray; Hutchinson; Roberts
